content: the misty mornings hat is a simple cozy winter beanie featuring a decorative band of twisted stitches crocheted from the top down in one piece this hat comes in sizes preemie to adult large and is easy to adjust for a snug fit or a slouchy style pair it with the matching cowl for a complete set also a free pattern uses medium worsted weight yarn and a 5 5 mm crochet hook > grab the free pattern from my website > or purchase the ad-free pdf right here > on ravelry **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d this is just one of the patterns included in our october hat of the month club collection > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until october 28 > 2024 at 11 59 pm est new york time > 23 59 for cal participants simply > add the pattern to your cart before > 11 59 pm est on october 28th and it > will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on october 27 2024 at 8 00 pm est new york time 20 00 > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
